content:
I'm pretty sure I'm officially famous. I have an IMDb page: https://www.imdb.com/name/nm17678160

It's cause of my appearance on software unscripted I now am on IMDb. Didn't realize they tracked podcasts.
Dunno if i heard this one. Im in the hospital right now recovering from broken arm surgery. Airpods In!
Did anything result from this? I know we have some fuzz testing facilities somewhere. Would these apply to anything for application testing on the new compiler?
You can see the live fuzzers at https://roc-lang.github.io/roc-compiler-fuzz/
@JRI98 is fairly active fixing or reporting fuzzer bugs.
A really helpful contribution is looking at the fuzz failures and making nice GH issues with a minimal reproduction.

Im in the hospital right now recovering from broken arm surgery.

Oof, I wish you a speedy recovery :)
I'm home now with laptop and shell. Still one-handed for the time being. :sweat_smile:
